allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Redesign app UI to match Instagram-inspired design mockups

Completely redesigned all major pages to match the design mockups with a clean, modern Instagram-inspired interface:

**Landing Page:**
- Updated hero section with cleaner gradient and layout
- Simplified header and footer
- Refined feature cards with lighter styling

**Home Feed Page:**
- Added left sidebar with navigation and stories
- Created trending destinations carousel
- Implemented Instagram-style post cards
- Added right sidebar with user suggestions

**Album Detail Page:**
- Implemented 60/40 split layout (carousel left, info sidebar right)
- Updated photo carousel with cleaner navigation
- Redesigned thumbnail strip
- Improved comments section
- Added related albums grid

**Countries Page:**
- Added collapsible accordion sections with country flags
- Implemented 4-column album grid
- Created simple album cards with "View Album" buttons

**Create Album Page:**
- Redesigned with two-column layout
- Improved photo upload area
- Refined form fields and buttons

**Explore Page:**
- Added popular journeys section (3-column grid)
- Created creators to follow section (4-column grid)
- Implemented featured destination hero

**Profile Pages:**
- Added top navigation bar
- Implemented left sidebar with user info and stats
- Created tabbed content area with album grid
- Added album title overlays

**New Components:**
- TrendingDestinations component
- SimpleAlbumCard component

**Design System:**
- Consistent teal accent color (#0D9488)
- Clean white backgrounds
- Instagram-inspired typography and spacing
- Subtle shadows and rounded corners
- Fully responsive across all devices

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add enhanced UI components for better reactivity and dynamics

New Libraries:
- @use-gesture/react for advanced touch gestures
- react-spring for physics-based animations
- @formkit/auto-animate for list animations
- react-loading-skeleton for premium loading states

New Components:
- shimmer-skeleton.tsx: Shimmer loading effects with stagger
- enhanced-button.tsx: Button with press feedback and ripple
- animated-count.tsx: Flip/slide number animations
- floating-input.tsx: Material Design floating labels
- pull-to-refresh.tsx: Pull-to-refresh for mobile
- enhanced-empty-state.tsx: Animated empty states
- EnhancedPhotoCarousel.tsx: Spring-based swipe physics
- EnhancedLikeButton.tsx: Like with count animation

New Hooks:
- useGestures.ts: Pinch-zoom, swipe, drag-to-dismiss, double-tap

Enhancements:
- PageTransition: Multiple variants \(fade, slide, scale\)
- Spring configs: Centralized animation timing

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
